mongodbDatabaseArticles.content:
It’s easy to get church overload in Granada but if you had to limit yourself to a handful, the Granada Cathedral should be one of them. The interior is intricate but the area it covers is what makes it such an impressive sight. The Cathedral is only a few Euro to enter and will take about 30 minutes to see.
